unnormalised: Preparations are in full swing for Isha Ambani’s twins’ 1st b’day party, scheduled for 12/12/2023. The event, touted as the bash of the year, is taking place at their sprawling residence in Mumbai. Security is already heightened, with traffic diversions expected from 10:00 AM onwards on Altamount Road.
normalised: Preparations are in full swing for Isha Ambani's twins' first birthday party, scheduled for twelfth december two thousand and twenty three. The event, touted as the bash of the year, is taking place at their sprawling residence in Mumbai. Security is already heightened, with traffic diversions expected from ten AM onwards on Altamount Road.

unnormalised: Insiders reveal that the theme revolves around a magical winter wonderland, with decorations being finalized until 11:59 PM on 11/12/2023. Rumours abound about which Bollywood celebs will be attending; word is SRK and family are definitely on the guest list. Caterers are preparing a lavish spread, with both Indian and international cuisines on offer.
normalised: Insiders reveal that the theme revolves around a magical winter wonderland, with decorations being finalized until eleven fifty nine PM on eleventh december two thousand and twenty three. Rumours abound about which Bollywood celebs will be attending; word is S-R-K and family are definitely on the guest list. Caterers are preparing a lavish spread, with both Indian and international cuisines on offer.

unnormalised: The exact time of the cake cutting is speculated to be at 6:00 PM sharp. While the media is kept at bay, social media is already buzzing with #IshaAmbaniTwinsBirthday trending since 1/12/2023. Official photos are anticipated to drop sometime around 13/12/2023.
normalised: The exact time of the cake cutting is speculated to be at six PM sharp. unnormalised: Speculations are also doing the rounds about what expensive gifts the little ones must be receiving. Several socialites and business partners have already started arriving to the venue. The family is tight-lipped about further details, but one thing is for sure: this event is definitely going to be the talk of the town for quite a while.
